name: Wicked Moai
description: What is the project about? Unlock your character's potential and shape the game's destiny on our Wicked Moai's community-driven, fully on-chain journey on zkSync. What makes your project unique? - Fully on-chain game immersion. Wicked Moai is a game world that operates entirely on the blockchain, using the zkSync Era Layer-2 protocol to achieve decentralization and fairness while addressing the challenges of on-chain games. - Character set first. Wicked Moai builds a set of characters from the beginning and subsequently creates stories and chapters that make those characters live with the game, utilizing the best of NFTs. The NFT collectibles focus on portraying the complexities of the human psyche, featuring unique storytelling about the duality of human nature. - Open journey. Users and community members are able to write their own storylines based on Wicked Moai's character set and determine the future of Wicked Moai. - Community-driven. Joining the game world provides access to a supportive community of developers, artists, content creators, and storytellers who are passionate about building an incredible game world. If users are interested in the story of Wicked Moai and would like to contribute ideas, they are welcome here: https://forms.gle/wepBjJZ4ipPfXkSX8. Wicked Moai's Token Economy Token name: MOAI token Token Symbol: MOAI Total Supply: 1,000,000,000,000 Token Utilities: In-game economy, trading purposes, community rewards, governance purposes, token grants for game world contributors.
